alert.note: Alert for Logan; Sherman; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 7:26PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Thomas, northern Logan and southeastern Sherman Counties through 700 PM MDT/800 PM CDT/... At 625 PM MDT/725 PM CDT/, emergency management reported a strong thunderstorm 6 miles north of Winona, or 16 miles south of Levant, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...At 722 PM CDT local emergency management reported heavy rain and pea sized hail in Winona. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Levant around 745 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Colby. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 34 and 67. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
